content.en: Speaker identification advancements: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to improve speaker identification systems. These algorithms, such as wavelet transform, Gaussian Mixture Model, Gammatone Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (GFCC), and Dynamic Mel-Frequency Cepstral Coefficient (DMFCC), are used to enhance the effectiveness and robustness of speaker identification in noisy environments. Other methods, like hidden Markov models (HMM), fuzzy models, and empirical mode decomposition, are also being investigated to develop more accurate and reliable speaker recognition systems.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for taleridentifikation: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre taleridentifikationssystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom wavelet transform, Gaussian Mixture Model, Gammatone Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (GFCC) og Dynamic Mel-Frequency Cepstral Coefficient (DMFCC), anvendes for at øge effektiviteten og robustheden af taleridentifikation i støjende miljøer. Andre metoder, som skjulte Markov-modeller (HMM), fuzzy modeller og empirisk tilstandsnedbrydning, undersøges også for at udvikle mere præcise og pålidelige talerigenkendelsessystemer.
